Data.Name: Value of matched group by group number
Data.Description: Substitutes the last substring matched by group number (decimal).

Data.Name: Value of matched group by group name
Data.Description: Substitutes the last substring matched by group name (string).

Data.Name: Entire match
Data.Description: Substitutes a copy of the entire match itself.

Data.Name: All text before match
Data.Description: Substitutes all the text of the input string before the match.

Data.Name: All text after match
Data.Description: Substitutes all the text of the input string after the match.
